transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello, sir, Parakut ki baat kar raha hu.

Customer: Ji.

Executive: Bataye sir. Sir, mai IndiaMART se baat kar raha hu. Aapka concern aaya tha na, uske regarding.

Customer: Kya aaya tha?

Executive: Sir, aapki IndiaMART proper ticket aayi thi na, uske regarding baat karni thi.

Customer: Achcha.

Executive: Bataye. Five sheets, five sheets vagarah ko leke aapko issue aa raha tha.

Customer: Sir, mai abhi aapse baat karta hu. Thodi der me khana kha leta hu na.

Executive: Achcha, to sir mai kitni der me call karu aapko?

Customer: Takreeban evening me baat kare, shaam ko.

Executive: Thik hai sir, aap ek time bata dijiye to mai kar lunga call aapko.

Customer: Ha, evening me kar lena aur dusre number pe karna.

Executive: Achcha achcha.

Customer: Hmm.

Executive: Sir, us pe maine subah se do baar try kiya to vo voicemail ja raha tha isliye maine aapko call kar diya isse.

Customer: Voicemail ho sakta hai. Dekho sir, aaj kaam bhi jyada hai uski vajah se attend nahi ho pa raha hoga.

Executive: Achcha achcha.

Customer: Hmm.

Executive: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer had an issue regarding five sheets.



Resolution:

- Executive will call the customer in the evening.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer in the evening.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- five sheets, call, evening
